long_description: The Petzl Accu 2 Ultra rechargeable battery strikes the perfect balance between capacity and compactness, making it comfortable on the head. Designed for use with the Petzl Ultra Rush Accu 2 and Accu 4 headlamps (sold separately). 2,600 mAh battery provides up to 2 hrs. of runtime on high and 38 hrs. on low, plus 1 hr. of reserve power. Lithium ion battery continues to work well at cold temperatures. Battery recharges in 3 hrs. using the quick charger that is included with the Petzl Ultra and Petzl Ultra Belt headlamps; battery can be recharged approximately 500 times.
short_description: The Petzl Accu 2 Ultra rechargeable battery strikes the perfect balance between capacity and compactness, making it comfortable on the head.
